title: Can we please nerf/remove Ahri movespeed on Q
body:
Before it becomes a "signature move" or "defining characteristic" on her? We don't need more "scot free" playstyle champions than we already do:

{{champion:238}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:7}} and to some extent {{champion:92}}.

I guarantee you the percentage of enjoyment when **we** as players play against those is significantly lower than when we play against champions like:

{{champion:22}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:102}}

replies.body: Yup, for a while now whenever riot creates/changes a champ they make it so that champ has massive mobility, and then they say that that champ is now defined by their mobility.  When riot changed Lucian they said they were making him "THE mobility adc" and a couple months later they came out with a champ who is unarguably more mobile than Lucian, Kalista.

But all Characters need a signature move. It's common screen write logic. 

Besides, considering that Riot's in favor of the throwback too kiting mage makes this very much unlikely.
I'm not saying she shouldn't have one, I'm saying the movespeed shouldn't be what she revolves around. She already has 3 dashes as a **ranged** champion, the movespeed is overkill.
